HC-SR04 Ultrasonic Distance Sensor

partno: SEN001

These ultrasonic sensors are stable, reliable, and accurate.

Out of Stock! Sorry!

$2.99


PRODUCT INFO

These ultrasonic sensors send out high-frequency (inaudible) pings in order to approximate distance from objects. Very useful, and very cost-effective for cases where you don't need high precision.

FEATURES

  • Easy to use with Arduino; 3rd party software libraries available
  • Ping Range: 2cm to 450cm
  • Does not make audible sound during operation, unlike cheap knockoffs.

INCLUDES

  • 1 HC-SR04 Ultrasonic Distance Sensor

TECH SPECS

Voltage:DC 5V
Static current:less than 2mA
High Electrical level output:5V high
Low Electrical level output:~0V
Induction angle:Not more than 15 degrees
Detection distance:2cm-450cm
High precision:2mm

Wiring: VCC, trig (control side), echo (receiving end), GND
